title: Comp Model Algorithms
description: Design, analysis and implementation of algorithms for modeling natural and engineered systems; algorithm experimentation, and optimization.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: CS 1331 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C or CS 1372 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C or CS 2316 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C or CX 4010 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C or ECE 2035 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C or ECE 2036 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C
